reviewText: so far only got into the chip 'n dale series, and first thing i noticed is the episodes aren't in order at all.  then next thing that was a huge disappointment was that the first episode isn't on the disks.  so you don't get any of the back story on anyone and trying to watch them in order isn't possible without a lot of work.  i was super excited and payed a lot of money and was totally disappointed.  if your like me and looking to get the shows you watched when you were younger, don't waste your money on these, you might try disney directly and probably would be able to get the ENTIRE series and probably in order.
